features: 24 HOUR HYDRATION: Eucerin Intensive Repair body lotion for sensitive skin immediately restores skin’s radiance and delivers 24-hour hydration
3 DIMENSIONAL FORMULA: This body moisturizer has a 3-dimensional system that moisturizes, exfoliates and conditions very dry, flaky skin
FREE OF: This paraben free body lotion is also fragrance free and dye free, and is gentle enough for use as a daily skin repair lotion for very dry skin
CONVENIENT LOTION BOTTLE: Eucerin body lotion pump bottle makes it simple to pump and apply anytime
INCLUDES: one (1) 16.9 fluid ounce bottle of Eucerin Intensive Repair Body Lotion, Sensitive Skin Lotion for Very Dry Skin
body.description: Eucerin Intensive Repair Body Lotion immediately restores skin’s radiance and delivers 24 hour hydration. This Eucerin Intensive Repair lotion contains a unique 3-dimensional formula that is enriched with Alpha Hydroxy and Natural Moisturizing Factors, and moisturizes, exfoliates and conditions very dry, flaky skin. The intensively moisturizing formula in this unscented body lotion immediately improves skin’s appearance. This fragrance free body lotion for dry skin is dye free and paraben free, so it's ideal for those with sensitive skin, and is gentle enough for use as a daily dry skin repair lotion. This body moisturizer is perfect as a very dry skin lotion, and can also be used as a hand lotion or foot lotion. To use, smooth this Eucerin sensitive skin lotion onto your body daily. Eucerin is a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. With skin care products designed to restore and sustain healthy-looking skin, families everywhere look to Eucerin to enhance outer beauty and self-confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can this product be applied to the face? Yes, the Eucerin Intensive Repair Lotion can be used on the face, but not directly around the eyes. Should you apply sunscreen with this product? Yes, Eucerin Intensive Repair Lotion contains Alpha Hydroxy acid (AHA), which may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product. Does this body lotion contain Urea? Yes, Eucerin Intensive Repair Lotion does contain Urea. What ingredients are in Eucerin Intensive Repair Lotion? You can find a full list of the ingredients in Eucerin Intensive Repair Body Lotion on the back of the jar and in the product images located at the top of this page. What is the difference between this product and Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion? Eucerin Intensive Repair Lotion is a rich moisturizing lotion for very dry skin. Our Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion is a lighter, faster absorbing lotion which also contains Alphahydroxy as well as Ceramide-3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy pump, great on skin! Good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy skin but be careful if you have a cat
reviews.reviewText: I inherited my dad's good teeth and his dry skin. When my skin gets dry, it gets itchy so I've been moisturizing my entire body after every shower since childhood. This is my cream of choice! The intensive formula is thick and makes my skin feel soft. The only negative about this product is that it has mineral oil in it which is very bad for cats. I have to be very conscious to put pants on after I use it if I'm going to feed her as she rubs against my legs and I don't want her to lick the cream off of her fur. I'm sure that I could use something else that's mineral oil free but I like this product enough to use it mindfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent after shower lotion.
reviews.reviewText: With the cold, dry winter days, this is my go to everyday lotion. Excellent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on really dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I always get incredibly dry hands and feet in the winter, and this stuff fixes them. During the rest of the year I'm fine, but my hands and feet get so dry in the winter that they will often crack and bleed. I tried several other brands, but once I tried Eucerin, I found the one that works for me. It doesn't have a strong smell and doesn't feel greasy when put on. In just a few minutes, your hands feel normal. Using this lotion every day has made a huge difference in my hands and feet. It really works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is quite thick and does help with hydration, but it is almost too thick. Has a stickiness that I am not fond of, but it does work well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the moisture in this lotion. It is a little more expensive than most drug store brands but well worth it! I thought buying the body butter from upscale online stores would work the best…wrong, they’re just more expensive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps my super dry skin!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only used it twice so far and I definitely say it’s helping with my extremely dry skin. Slight stickiness after drying but not bad enough to outweigh the pros.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is amazing. It's not greasy and it isn't scented. If you have dry skin, use this lotion and you will definitely see a difference. I cannot go without it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente para reparar la piel seca
reviews.reviewText: Entrega inmediata. Muy buen producto que me ha ayudado a mejorar un problema de resequedad serio que tenia en la piel de brazos y piernas.
This product is excellent for dry skin! Although it is a bit expensive. And it’s not always available in stores.So I appreciate the fact that I can order it and it get delivered straight to my door.
O creme é de hidratação profunda, mas não é perfumado, o que não é um problema para mim. A entrega foi pontual e sem ocorrências.
Helped with my ichtyosis in winters. Will recommend. No smell at all.

Pour ma part, j'ai les mains extrêmement sèches avec crevasses en hiver ! => très douloureux.une noisette de crème le soir avant coucher, la crème agit gentiment la nuit et le lendemain matin, les petits bobos et crevasses sont réparés, la peau est souple … c'est magique. J'utilise aussi cette crème sur le visage le matin après rasage.Sensation de souplesse et de fraîcheur garantie. Cette crème est neutre en senteur et n'est aucunement grasse, elle pénetre rapidement sur peaux sèches. Je recommande vivement.
